Section.name: About ACET
Section.description:
Anjuman College of Engineering & Technology, Nagpur was established in 1999 and managed by Anjuman Hami-E-Islam Trust, Nagpur. For well over 125 years. Irrespective of the considerations of the various caste and creed It has wide spread reputation in the field of education in Vidharbha and is currently running 20 educational Institutions.

Festivals -
International Conference on Advances in Engineering and Technology (2014)-It is being held on 8th and 9th January 2014 at Anjuman College of Engineering and Technology, Nagpur.ICAET - 2014 aims to bring together researchers, scholar students, scientists, engineers and share their experiences , ideas and research results relating to various engineering fields.
